Summary: The post Cartoon appeared first on The Guardian Nigeria News - Nigeria and World News.

Title: 21 years after, FG approves pensions for Nigeria Airways staff
Summary: Former employees of the defunct Nigeria Airways will receive their pensions . Minister of Aviation and Aerospace Development, Festus Keyamo, facilitated the approval of their pension benefits .

Title: Of airlines and their passengers
Summary: The brickbat between one of Nigeria’s foremost carriers, AirPeace and the Senator representing Edo North in the National Assembly, Comrade Adams Oshiomole has thrown up some of the real issues confronting the aviation sector in Nigeria .

Title: TCN restores electricity to six North-East states after prolonged darkness
Summary: TCN restores normal bulk electricity supply to six states in North-East Nigeria . The power supply has been restored to the six states after prolonged darkness . The six states are located in the North-east of Nigeria .

Title: Nigeria unveils export trading company to support MSMEs
Summary: The Federal Ministry of Industry, Trade and Investment, in collaboration with the Nigeria Commodity Exchange (NCX) and the Africa Trade and Distribution Company (ATDC) is in advanced discussions to establish Nigeria’s first National Export Trading Company .

Title: Civil War: Gowon distorted Aburi Accord history, Group claims
Summary: Group, Rising Sun, accuses retired General Yakubu Gowon of distorting the history behind the failure of the historic Aburi Accord of 1967, which they claim led to the Nigerian Civil War . The group, in a statement issued on Sunday in Abuja, asserted that Gowon distorted the history .

Title: ‘How my genotype changed from SS to AA’ – Cole fights to end sickle cell in Africa
Summary: Ambassador Eniola Cole, a versatile advocate, is leading efforts to eradicate Sickle Cell Disease in Africa . Recently, she hosted a key event, marking Juneteenth and World Sickle Day, while launching initiatives to empower young women and address public health .

Title: Politicians defecting are greedy, lack discipline —Wale Oshun
Summary: MR Olawale Oshun, a former Chief Whip of the House of Representatives, is the National President of the Afenifere Renewal Group, ARG . The former lawmaker was on exile during the June 12, 1993, 1993 election . Those who annulled June 12 will face God’s judgement .

Title: 2027: Why Tinubu can’t drop Shettima
Summary: President Bola Tinubu appears not in the mood to dump Kashim Shettima in favour of any other northern politician, Vanguard has learnt . Interests are trying to get the Vice President replaced ahead of the 2027 poll .

Title: Catholic Bishops call for prayers to end killings
Summary: Catholic Bishops of the Archdiocese of Onitsha Ecclesiastical Province have called for prayers from the faithful in the area to end bloodshed and killings in Nigeria . This came as Anglican Communion slams govt over weaponisation of hunger, poverty .

Title: Tinubu hails Tony Elumelu's wife Awele at 55
Summary: President Bola Tinubu on Monday congratulated the Chairperson of Avon Healthcare Limited, Dr. Awele Elumelu, as she celebrates her 55th birthday . The President described her as a distinguished physician, devoted mother and wife, philanthropist, and entrepreneur, acknowledging her contributions to national development .

Title: ATM usage drops as POS agents handle N223tn
Summary: Point of Sale terminals handled transactions worth N223.27tn in 2024, representing a significant increase from the N110.35tn recorded in 2023 . The value of ATM withdrawals in 2024 was N29.12tn, a slight increase from N28.21tn in the previous year . The total number of POS transactions rose from

Title: Wamakko disowns 2027 VP ambition
Summary: Senator Aliyu Wamakko has distanced himself from reports linking him to a purported 2027 vice-presidential ambition . In a press statement made available to The PUNCH on Sunday, the former governor of Sokoto State and Sarkin Yamman Sokoto, described the claims as false, unauthorised, and politically

Title: Delta North APC divided over Nwoko’s 2027 endorsement
Summary: The endorsement of the senator representing Delta North Senatorial District in the Senate has sparked sharp division within the All Progressives Congress in the district . Party leaders in Aniocha North, Nwoko’s home base, reaffirmed their support, while the senatorial leadership moved to disown the endorsement .

Title: PDP kicks as APM blasts Adeleke over Osun VAT
Summary: Allied Peoples Movement in Osun State berated Governor Ademola Adeleke’s administration over what it tagged a poor Value Added Tax record .
